result.title: Analysis report on human-AI teaming variants
result.description: Report as output of Task 1.1 and 1.2, containing: (i) status-quo analysis of human-AI teaming in all phases of the AI system engineering lifecycle (at engineering time, set-up, maintenance and adaptions to changes); (ii) data and evidence-based elaboration of case study examples key performance indicators of Overall Equipment Efficiency (OEE) and Overall Labour Effectiveness (OLE)
